text: Barbara Linnea Quigley (born May 27, 1958) is an American actress. She acts mostly in movies. She acted in the 1985 horror movie Return of the Living Dead. She also did a lot of independent movies. Quigley was born in Davenport, Iowa. ==References== Category:Actors from Davenport, Iowa Category:People from Davenport, Iowa Category:1958 births Category:Living people
title: Linnea Quigley
